website_summaries.verdict: Popular and sturdy, this non-toxic yoga strap gets the job done for the environmentally-conscious yogi.
pros: Comes in 8 vibrant colors (purple and blue are reviewer favorites) and 2 lengths (8 and 10 feet)
D-ring buckle doesn’t budge a bit, even in boat pose
cons: Minor complaints of unraveling at the stitching and worries about how long product will last

customer_reviews.title: I sat in boat pose for a good 15 minutes and the buckle did not give at ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly seeing this product had 5 stars from just about every customer made me think maybe this company was buying reviews. However, I got mine yesterday and started to do some basic Iyengar yoga moves with it. I sat in boat pose for a good 15 minutes and the buckle did not give at all ! This is really important for me because i have long but thin limbs and most straps don't hold well for me. This one did great! I'm 5"9 and i got the basic length and it is long enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this strap for several reasons: good reviews, quality, and price. When I learned the seller is a small company owned and run by women, it cinched the deal. I am working on my yoga teaching certificate and my current strap's tendency to slip through the D-rings was driving me crazy! This strap has a good texture and will only improve the more I use it. It's a bit stiff right now as I just started using it, but have no doubt it's going to become a favorite prop in my yoga practice. Namaste
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Wonderly

customer_reviews.title: Best Yoga Strap Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that I needed a new Yoga strap until my instructor tried some new positions that needed a longer, stronger strap than the one I had. Apparently, an 8 foot strap best suits women, whereas, a 10 foot strap works for men. This strap suited the bill in so many ways! It was longer, stronger, and colorful (Mine is purple.). The buckle was also bigger and holds the strap in place. The seller kept me informed about the shipment, was prompt in delivering it, and even followed up afterward! If you're looking for a great Yoga strap, look no further. This is the one to get!🙏😊
customer_reviews.author: YogaLover

customer_reviews.title: Tighter weave than others I have owned so it should last.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. 8 foot is a useful length. Great choice of colors. Has a separate velcro tab to keep it wrapped up when not in use, or when you carry it to class. Photo shows how to fasten into a loop. Put end of strap through BOTH D-rings. Then fold it over and put it through the one d-ring. Make sure both d-rings slope the way they are shown. then pull the strap tight. You can do this at any position on the yoga strap to make different size loops.
customer_reviews.author: Job S Tadoo

customer_reviews.title: Good length, strong fabric
customer_reviews.text: I ordered straps from different companies so I could compare. I decided to keep the Clever yoga strap dud to its length, sturdiness and organic fabric. In the pictures theres a pink Tumaz, the green Clever and the creamy Repose. I'd have kept this last one too cause I loved the fact that the fabric is truly organic cotton, but it was thinner and had a stitch on both sides that I thought could easily be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Frayed upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: The strap will work for what it’s used for. I don’t see myself breaking it anytime soon however, the workmanship of the strap is a little flawed. It’s just kind of bothersome looking at the frayed part every time I’ll use it. I can just trim the frayed piece off and hope that it doesn’t fray anymore. The price of this particular color (green) isn’t too bad. Under $6. The other colors cost more. If the strap happens to fray more and I decide to replace it, I’d buy another brand. I bought a Reehut and the workmanship/ quality control seems to be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: NVDarkfrog

customer_reviews.title: It's like a waxed canvas or nylon strap
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I need to break it in but the fabric is a little tough, unlike other yoga straps I've used. It's like a waxed canvas or nylon strap.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Seems Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use this yet, so that could change the review to 5-stars. It arrived quickly, is good construction, seems very durable, and the color matches my mat perfectly. I have never owned a yoga strap before, and I got the 10-foot because I have very tight hamstrings & not a lot of flexibility in my back (plus I am a larger woman). I hope this helps me attain some of the poses that are currently too much for me. It is possible that an 8-foot would have sufficed, but I decided too long was better than too short in this case.
customer_reviews.author: Terese Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’3” 180 pounds with a fairly decent size chest and needed the 10’ strap for the shoulder support/alignment in yoga class. Does the job perfectly and the owner of the company gives you a direct line of contact if there are any issues. I didn’t have any but it’s nice when a small company stands behind their product. Support this company and get some great gear at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: The Pro 47

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: I did not start using it yet, but just in case if I get busy, and I am a busy person, I just wanted to share my first impression. It arrived super fast, packeged in a nice little box, with a very cute personal note. As a fellow small business owner, I want to thank Ellie for such a nice job. It made my day and I feel like I got a gift, though I paid for it. Cannot wait to start using.
customer_reviews.author: LSNY12

customer_reviews.title: Great for flexibility stretches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help improve my flexibility. As a long distance runner, I’ve noticed my hips getting tighter and less flexible, so I thought I’d start to make an effort and do more stretching. So far this yoga band has been very effective with stretches to help improve my hip flexibility. I am 5’8”, and have found the 10 foot strap is a great length for my leg/hip flexibility stretches. It seems pretty strong and durable and was a great price. I would definitely recommend it for someone looking to improve his/her flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: What has happened to Prime?
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. It does what it is supposed to do, and it functions as expected. The problem is Amazon Prime. By using Prime I was supposed to get this product in two days. That was the reason for not subjecting myself to traffic and COVID-infested humanity. On the day it was supposed to be delivered, I received an email that stated I wouldn't get it until two days later. If I'd known that, I would gone to Lowes to get it. Customer service's attitude was basically, "get over it." It took four days to get a product that was advertised as two-day delivery. I suspect Amazon lied to get me to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one in my regular classes
customer_reviews.text: Having to workout at home for the time being meant getting some of my own yoga equipment. The thing I missed the most from my regular yoga class is a straps provided in session. The ones I found in store are never long enough (though I am short, I prefer a longer strap to adapt my pose). So when I saw that they had an 8 foot stap...I jumped on it. I am not disappointed. It's sturdy, but lightweight. Being able to adapt my pose means I get the most out of my practice!
customer_reviews.author: Flipchick76

customer_reviews.title: Needed a long strap for shoulder physical therapy; this fits the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use in home physical therapy exercise to correct a partially torn rotator cuff. Specifically the strap is used to align shoulders for better posture. The 10' length is perfect, and the strap is well made. Wifey-poo also has a Clever Yoga mat, and loves the extra cushioning and slip resistance of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: My yoga strap arrived in perfect condition. It is very well made. I washed it before I used it and it is very soft now. I do yoga at home with DVDs and the strap is helping me increase flexibility. I did a lot of research on-line before choosing this product; there are so many straps to choose from. I paid full price for this strap and was not compensated in any way for my review. I'm glad I purchased the Clever Yoga 8-Foot Yoga Strap.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised and was perfect for what I needed. I joined a yoga studio, and didn't like the fact that everyone is using the yoga straps on their bare feet (yuck) so wanted my own. I love that this one is purple - my favorite color and matches my matt and bag. Its long enough and well constructed. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Walls

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality I did a yoga with strap workout I found on YouTube. Better than I expected! Bought the 8 foot, great length for women. Would highly recommend. Card included with a phone number to contact if I have any questions. Great small company to buy from with excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Anne Read

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and the price is right.
customer_reviews.text: I am a practitioner of Aikido (Shodan) and use this strap to do a series of stretches after exercising to gain better flexibility which also helps to prevent injuries. So far, I am very pleased with this product and I do feel my flexibility has increased since I have bought this product. There a lot more fancier products on the market but this one is simple, durable and definitively worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Happy that I Chose a Clever Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of fabric, hardware, and stitching. I have enjoyed using the yoga strap both at home and at class. This strap was offered at a good price. I didn't know about the company Clever Yoga before ordering this strap, but I am happy that I chose a Clever Yoga strap as the customer service, via followup to check on my satisfaction, is impressive. Clever Yoga's website offers additional information -- blogs and videos -- and looking at the information, I see that Clever Yoga is a small company. I look forward to making additional purchases from this company to support its mission and, selfishly, to buy myself quality yoga mercvhandise.
customer_reviews.author: JSB Fan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well made strap, in my favorite color!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made strap. I love the vibrant purple color! I have been using it to help me stretch, sitting on the floor with it looped around my toes. I have just started yoga, and really need to work on stretch, so this strap is perfect for me to use at home, in between sessions. I keep it in the family room, and use it while I am watching TV. Over time, I am sure I will find more uses for it, as my skill (hopefully) develops. Strap arrived very quickly, and the followup from the company has been great. I definitely recommend this strap and this company!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K.

customer_reviews.title: Long strap, but good quality construction!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I didn't pay attention to what length this strap was before I ordered...8-feet is long. LOL But, I'm okay with that. I would rather it be a bit too long for me (I'm 5'6") rather than too short. The strap was a bit stiff, but I chalked that up to the fact that it is new. It already feels a bit better and softer after use. I use it every day to stretch my tight calves and hamstrings to help alleviate my Achilles Tendinitis. It might be long, but a good quality constructed strap.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had it 30 years ago. I always used a broom Handel or a Olympic bar to stretch chest and shoulders but after a few yoga classes using the studio ones I realized what I had been missing. This one feels like better quality than the ones I used at studio. I do wish the rings locked the length better but it is better all around than the others I have used. Also I got the exact color I wanted ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Clever is great and you should support their business.
customer_reviews.text: I love my strap. Doing my stretches while watching TV or practicing my yoga easier. I love that I can get the deep stretch I have been missing just using my hands. I would recommend this strap to anyone who is practicing and wants it at a fair price. It came quick. The awesome part is they reached out to confirm receipt. That is amazing customer service,especially in our times of everything is always half done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for forearm stand.
customer_reviews.text: I strap arrived just in time for me to work on my forearm stand and Feathered Peacock pose. I need the strap to keep my upper arms in place, which forces me to hug into the center line as I go upside down for those inversions. It's sturdy and easy to use, and comes at a great price. Namasté. 🙏
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Very good strap with a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great strap. It’s got a good thickness and feels durable. I haven’t had it very long so I can’t really speak to how sturdy it is over time. I was considering more expensive straps from Lululemon and Alo but did some searching and found this. I’m so glad I went with this strap. I can’t imagine those larger brand straps can be any better.
customer_reviews.author: JnL

customer_reviews.title: Great strap for yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: The weave is nice and tight, fabric is sturdy, and the D rings securely hold the loop allowing one to stretch out your legs, etc. I've used this length in classes. In fact, this specific strap is sturdier than my shorter strap that I have been using for years. Truly is excellent for my yoga practice.
customer_reviews.author: F. Carter Heim

customer_reviews.title: Well made and a choice of colors!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing yoga for years. We always use a strap during class. I have always thought it was unsanitary to use ones used by others so decided to buy one. These straps are well made and because they come in many colors when I am allowed to return to group yoga mine will not get confused with other people’s.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: The purple is just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner yogi and our instructor has using straps for some stretches. I bought this because of reviews and the purple color. The purple is just like the picture. The strap works perfect for my yoga practice. The strap is comfortable in the hand, the length is excellent and the product is well made. I recommend this product to all who ask.
customer_reviews.author: Shari K. Larson

customer_reviews.title: great yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down now that it's a global pandemic and got myself a strap to use for yoga at home. This is nice and sturdy, and honestly 10ft is kinda long LOL, but I figured it would be better than getting one that's too short. I like the variety of colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: IWISHUWOULD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great color!
customer_reviews.text: This strap is what I had expected. It's a sturdy strap, which is good because you don't want a yoga strap that flexes or frays at the first sign of pressure. The rings are durable and well-secured. The color is absolutely perfect, and it's just what I wanted! Plus, it comes with this neat little velcro strap to secure it so that you don't have to just wind it up and hope it doesn't unravel. I would definitely recommend this to all practitioners!
customer_reviews.author: hippiefemme

customer_reviews.title: Stop sending me emails!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fine yoga strap. But I have now received FIVE review requests in my email from the seller in 24 hours. For crying out loud, it is a strap, it acts like a strap, it does whatever strap-related things you want it to do. what more is there to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga strap!
customer_reviews.text: I got this wonderful strap for my 6'6" husband, but he prefers to use his new mat strap instead because it wraps so nicely around his feet. Well..., to each his or her own, I guess. I love my gray one and use it all the time. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rani Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Staying loose and flexible is a great way to decrease the chances of getting injured
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an avid yoga practitioner, I just lift a ton of weights and I want to prevent injury. Staying loose and flexible is a great way to decrease the chances of getting injured! It's kinda funny how something so simple is ingeniously helpful. I grew up doing a lot of partner style stretches, but with this I'm able to do most stretches I want to do by myself. So far the strap has proven itself to be very durable. I've had it for a few months now and there really isn't any wear & tear. It looks just like I got it out of the box. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Great for Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strap to use in my Yoga class. I really like the color and the length. It is perfect to use in class and have the convenience of having my own. If you use these in your yoga practice, I would purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Helpful link makes using easy
customer_reviews.text: The yoga strap is terrific! I'm so stiff I can't do stretches, but with the strap that is behind me (no pun intended). Anyway, I like the strap and the access provided to the web site where I was able to get information on how to use it but also a ton more helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: beachbumbwl

customer_reviews.title: Nice strap, new colors
customer_reviews.text: The strap is functional and a different color (dark green) than the usual straps seen everywhere else. Easy to take to a class and not get mixed up with other's or the yoga studio's straps. Length is good too- 8 ft. --that a taller person can use.
customer_reviews.author: SteelShark

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help revive my personal yoga practice. It is also very useful in physical therapy exercises I am doing for a deep-tissue ankle injury. It is long enough and sturdy. I like the velcro strap that keeps it neat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, especially for a 10 foot strap. It's not the softest strap, but it's wide enough not to dig in. I'd also prefer squared rings instead of rounded D rings, but these work and the strap doesn't slide out. The extra length is helpful for certain uses as I'm taller, and doing the strap "backpack" for your upper shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJ

customer_reviews.title: Not only for yoga
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this strap to help with exercises after a total shoulder replacement. It works great to help lift my arm behind my back while pulling the strap forward on the opposite shoulder. Highly recommend for rehab.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Nice company and product
customer_reviews.text: A very nice strap; I have not used a strap before (I don't do a ton of yoga, but when one has been required, I have usually grabbed my resistance bands--rubbery, I must say). I decided to get one as I love Linda Wooldridge's Barlates routines, and she recommended the strap, so I thought why not? It is made from a nice cotton, the green I selected is a warm forest green, which I really like. The loop is a nice touch, and I think it will last, well, forever for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a belt in an emergency.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a strap. Put it around your foot and pull. It will increase your range of motion. It’s called stretching. Try it sometime, you just might feel better and who knows it might improve your looks too.
customer_reviews.author: MRC

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed Belt
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this belt to work on stretches as part of my physical therapy at home. The strap is very well made and study. It has no stretch which is what I needed. The color, pink, is the color as seen on the website. I purchased the 8 foot strap that is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Commerce Reader

customer_reviews.title: Construction excellent. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap was purchased to help me with PT exercises following lower back surgery. I'm very happy I chose the Clever Yoga product. It is very high-quality and honestly perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: Strong and long enough
customer_reviews.text: The price is great, and most of the time you end up having to buy a whole package of yoga products in order to get this strap. Used it for the first time this past Saturday at yoga and this instructor has different classes requiring the use of blocks and straps more often than not.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mang

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for a yoga strap.
customer_reviews.text: Nice yoga strap. Good price and I like that there were colors to choose from. I purchased the purple and the color is nice and bright, the buckle is sturdy and seams are sewn nicely. Based on the quality I think this yoga strap will last me a long while which is great.
customer_reviews.author: ANAGEV

customer_reviews.title: Really nice heavy duty strap
customer_reviews.text: Received my strap - very nice. Heavy duty weave with strong "D" loops -- exactly what I hoped to receive. Have you considered 'infinity straps'? Would like the same quality and color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: We used straps in that class and I felt so amazing the next day
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this strap after a recent yoga class that I attended. We used straps in that class and I felt so amazing the next day; as if I'd reached muscles that hadn't been used in a long time. I love the way these allow you to really access your body and reach poses that are otherwise challenging. This strap is a lovely green color, and is clearly made very well. I'm excited to add this to my yoga collection.
customer_reviews.author: Bean & PeanutTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A Rheumatologist recommended that I add an exercise twice daily to my ...
customer_reviews.text: A Rheumatologist recommended that I add an exercise twice daily to my regimen to stretch my hip muscles and keep them from becoming inflamed. This Yoga strap makes the exercise both possible and controllable so that an injury doesn't occur. It is very strong and one has no thought of it breaking. The only con I can find with the stray is that the edges can become irritating to one's hands if it is used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AvidGardner

customer_reviews.title: Love my new strap.
customer_reviews.text: I’m Amazon Prime, so delivered quickly. I prefer to use my own props. I already had a strap, but for some poses, needed a longer one, which is why I bought this one. Works as one would expect a yoga strap to work. ;-) Glad to have my own, long strap & not have to use a community one at the yoga studio.
customer_reviews.author: SusieL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality strap. Really considerate seller who I would buy from again. In fact I plan to purchase this same strap in another color. The first in grey is for my husband. We are taking beginning Yoga. Also plan to use these durable straps for other kinds of physical therapy. Very good value in every way. The seller offered tips to get started. Especially liked the one using the strap while at a desk in front of the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Faye A.

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: This strap works exactly like I wanted. Our instructor uses one just like it and we love it. For those who are not color selective you can get the green one at a better price than the blue one. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Dancin'Dan

customer_reviews.title: Function, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the yoga strap and the travel mat and both worked great at a recent retreat that I went to. I got them both in pink, both are very pretty colors. Will be shopping more with Clever Yoga!
customer_reviews.author: kittychi

customer_reviews.title: I happen to be a bit like bigfoot in a ballet class
customer_reviews.text: If you happen to be a little larger frame than the ladies in yoga class a 10 foot strap makes a lot of difference. I happen to be a bit like bigfoot in a ballet class. We use them in the studio that I go to in Tarpon Springs. I made an extended trip to Tn and got away without the strap. So, found this one. It came quickly and is a great strap. I use it to tie my yoga blanket and blocks together. The yoga mat has its own bag or I would tie that together as well. Purple happens to be a personal chakra color favorite so that is why purple. Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy, quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for yoga. The strap is thick enough and sturdy. After so many uses for about 4 months, it hasn't worn out from all the use. It's long enough to use at various lengths you need. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ness

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: I had knee surgery a few months ago and a physical therapist recommended using a yoga strap for some of my recovery exercises. I did some comparison shopping online and this looked like the best one available at a reasonable price. I’m very happy with my purchase! The strap is well constructed and sturdy, and I really like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The belt is ideal. I'm only 5 ft so a 6 ft probably would have been fine, but still glad I have the extra 2 ft. The product arrived timely and it comes with a small velcro strap which I think is great for a neat storage and prevents tangling. The belt itself appears to be well made. The D rings are easy to use and stay in place where they are positioned. I ordered the Pink that is a true Rose pink. Much better than using a makeshift with a belt or rope.
customer_reviews.author: TeenieBeanie

customer_reviews.title: Great strap
customer_reviews.text: Great strap looks like it's gonna last. It's tudy and color was accurate. For the price and seeing others in store it was a great buy. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: Useful sturdy strap for yoga poses
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this yoga strap... its sturdiness makes it user friendly, helpful in aiming it for my extended foot... so much better than the totally limp scarf I was using!
customer_reviews.author: Annapj

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best straps I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best straps I've used...and actually the first one I've purchased Prior to now I've only used the ones in the yoga classes that I've attended. In other words, this strap is better than most of the ones many of you may have used in your practice as well. It is 8ft vs. 6ft, strong & firm and very well sewn. I'm very tall and the extra length allows me to do some stretches that weren't permitted with the smaller strap. Also, I've gotten two of the nicest emails from the owner, Ellie....obviously very conscientious people with pride in their product and concern for their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Whiteowl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it in the mail today. I tried it out little bit and I loved it. The strap is made very well, seems strong and able to be tugged on when in poses. I couldn't do their idea with using it to straighten my back because of my size. I tried cow face because I have a problem, I felt how my shoulders stretched and I loved it. I can't wait to use it in class tomorrow. I would recommend this to anyone who needs help with stretching.
customer_reviews.author: The Southern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great strap, professional quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this strap. It is very sturdy woven cotton, and I have used similar straps in yoga studios, so I know it will soften with use. I chose the 8 foot length, which is perfect for me to stretch my legs, and I'm about 5'4". Good smooth eye rings if you want a fixed loop. I love the purple color!
customer_reviews.author: Trekkergram

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed!! The metal D rings make it a ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I am new to yoga straps, I was introduced to the plastic buckle type by my physical therapist. Wanting to expedite my progress, I decided upon this particular strap based on its rave reviews. I was not disappointed!! The metal D rings make it a cinch for even a novice like myself to utilize this item in the most efficient way possible. The strap itself is strong and durable, length seems perfect, and looks like it will last for many years to come. Plus. this item comes with a lifetime warranty from its seller, a small family owned business.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Love the cherry purple color
customer_reviews.text: Great stretching strap that I use at home to supplement physical therapy sessions. I miss the sewn in holds for feet or hands that some other styles have. Sturdy construction. Awesome purple color...adds a cherry dimension to exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet CA

customer_reviews.title: Good for non slip grip, not smoothest material as compared to Tumaz.
customer_reviews.text: Good strap but I ordered 4 straps at one time to try. This is good but if you want one with more stretch and softer, smoother feel go with the Tumaz. I do think this one will be a firmer, no slip option.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and quality of strap
customer_reviews.text: great length and extremely durable, just what I need for Chair Yoga. Would recommend this brand strap to anyone who is looking for an exceptional strap at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: margaret r conway

customer_reviews.title: I really like this yoga belt
customer_reviews.text: I really like this yoga belt. I don't know much about yoga and the different types of styles of yoga belts, but this belt really helped me stretch my muscles after a workout. I was never able to sit down and touch my toes, this belt help me achieve that, I was also able to touch my knew with my forehead. You just have to stretch a lot to loosen your muscles! Practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Strap!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seller! I personally will always write a review when the company contacts me to ask about the quality of the item and thank me for my purchase! It is a personal touch that seems to be lost in my online shopping these days. The quality of the yoga strap is wonderful and the color is beautiful! I use it daily and am very happy with my purchase as well as the price point. This would be a wonderful gift for anyone who has a yoga practice or wants to begin one!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good.
customer_reviews.text: Range of motion? That's up to me. Easy to use? No, because I am a yoga novice and nothing is easy. Sturdy? Yes, it will outlast me. I got exactly what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H. Furstenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great product, better customer service
customer_reviews.text: The strap is great! works exactly as expected and I was impressed with the price. Almost better than this strap, though, was the email that I received from the owner of Clever Yoga while I was waiting for delivery. Ellie let me know that my strap was on my way and provided a useful back stretching technique to use with the strap after long periods of sitting. Because of this little trick that I didn't know about before, I am likely going to purchase a second strap so that I can keep one on my desk at work. After a long day at the office, Ellie's trick is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jmlar062

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: I really haven’t used this yet as my classes are canceled. But when they start again I wanted to have my own equipment. The strap feels quite sturdy and doesn’t cut into my hands as other straps have. It is really long. I am very hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It's PURPLE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it. It does what it's supposed to do without a bunch of extras. Good price. AND it's PURPLE!
customer_reviews.author: liscubed

customer_reviews.title: Nice yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap has a good solid double D ring. Very important that the rings are able to hold without slipping since this is a safety issue if they fail.
customer_reviews.author: Comparison shopper extreme

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: The strap arrived very quickly. I'm impressed with the workmanship. It is sturdily made and should last a very long time. A great strap. Update: I've used this strap a LOT, and am still happy with it. The feel of the fabric has softened with use, but it is still sturdy and all workmanship is flawless. No fraying or loose threads. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gjdada

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sturdy flexible strap
customer_reviews.text: I received this strap in a timely manner and it is excellent quality, sturdy and strong and perfect for yoga. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DAC

customer_reviews.title: Love.
customer_reviews.text: I'm over 50 and after a long period of less mobility after a knee replacement, I thought I might try this strap to help me control my stretches and push them in ways that I haven't been able to. This strap is great. It is helping my stretch muscles I have a hard time pin pointing otherwise. It has helped me with my achillis tendon which had tightened so much it was giving me foot problems. It gives me the support and the control I need to push myself. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and used it for couple of days now. It is good quality, very durable. It is the product as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Metal D rings can be distracting. Still good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The metal D rings on this are loud when hitting the yoga studio floor when setting down. It's a bit distracting. In hindsight I'd have chosen a plastic strap adjustment over the metal had I known how distracting setting it on the floor would be. Obviously not an issue if you're on the beach or large bamboo mat that will muffle the sound. VERY long. I chose this, but it is a bit excessive. Still functions well, and I like the color.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Pretty purple color
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Pretty purple color. Solid, strong for Iyengar yoga poses I do. Haven't used it much, so will see how it holds up, but so far I love it. Also love that it doesn't have any strong chemical smells like some yoga products do. In addition, the seller sent me an email right away that was upbeat and positive to be sure I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Very functional, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is more user friendly than the manduka straps I have (not as pretty)---the manduka seem to not hold the loop and constantly are sliding. I think the material in this is also more stiff and uncomfortable on this skin- but the buckle makes it the most functional. Who cares about soft cotton straps, if the strap doesn't stay where you need? Bottom line, it works and is a great deal. The best thing would be this hardware design in the soft manduka straps.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca'n'Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Delivered quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made of 100 organic cotton. It was delivered promptly and I was able to use it immediately. I could not rate durability because I've just started using it but it looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: john stasko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sized Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought a Yoga strap of my own, instead of using the one's provided at the Rec. Center I go to. What I love about his strap is the length. I bought the 8ft. one and it is perfect for me (I'm 5'2"). Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality Yoga strap at a very attractive price. I bought a red 8' and blue 10' and could not be happier. The buckles are well made making it easy for the strap to be adjusted from difficult positions.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C

customer_reviews.title: Superb Yoga Strap
customer_reviews.text: I started using it last weekend, and I am quite pleased with my purchase. The strap is sturdy and the rings don't slide about like other items I've tried. All in all, a strap worthy of the investment I made. I look forward to many years of practice with it. The helpful tips I received from the company was an unexpected yet welcome plus with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peta of LLS

customer_reviews.title: It's a strap
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a Yoga strap and they sent us Yoga strap. Seems sturdy. It is flexible. It does all the things a strap Yoga strap should do.
customer_reviews.author: W. Aumack

customer_reviews.title: It's thinner than expected. Also it looks cheap andeals ...
customer_reviews.text: It's thinner than expected. Also it looks cheap andeals it is unraveling from our e side.
customer_reviews.author: María Paz Domínguez

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Durable
customer_reviews.text: It was recommended by my hatha yoga class to purchase a strap. I was torn between this one and the Gaiam one, but some reviews about the stiffness of the Gaiam one led me to purchase this one. It is a soft cotton strap, but very sturdy and strong. A week later, my temp instructor found a bag of straps our normal instructor had left and they were all this brand! Like most workout equipment, I wish they had more color options, but understand that it's not always possible. I bought the dark grey which is about a shade darker than my mat and towel. Great to support the little guy over the mass produced Gaiam brand I think ;)
customer_reviews.author: Alicein Wonderland

customer_reviews.title: sturdy but doesn't slide
customer_reviews.text: This cotton strap is well constructed so, the quality is not the issue I have with it. It's stiff and it is not easy to shorten or lengthen strap by pulling on the loose end.
customer_reviews.author: PJH

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty good strap
customer_reviews.text: Overall a pretty good strap. This is my first time purchasing/using one so I don't really have a basis for comparison. The material is not as soft as I would have expected - it's like a nylon versus a softer cotton. And 8 feet is reeeeeaaalllly long. I'm sure there will be a need for such length at some point but for someone who can (sometimes) reach their toes, there's a lot of extra length for basic use.
customer_reviews.author: daniel goyeneche

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for a little bit now but the range of motion that it's allowed me to accomplish that a towel never could is amazing. I'm a bit on the taller side and all my towels just weren't long enough to accommodate my beginning flexibility, so I looked into yoga straps, saw this one, ordered it and I absolutely love it. I am 5'8 and I got the smaller strap and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been great. I purchased the yoga strap to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great. I purchased the yoga strap to help with my flexibility. The fact that this is 10 feet offers the ability to use it for a variety of stretches. I've been able to use this by simply pulling both ends, or by wrapping it around my foot and using the D clasps as a way to "tie" the strap to the end of my leg. I've been quite impressed with the various uses.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great strap!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect strap, just as described. I got the 10 foot, which is probably more than I need but it will never be too short ;-) It works well, has the right amount of friction so that the buckle does not slip but it's easy to adjust when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgana

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy strap is perfect for stretching and fostering range of motion without overextending joints and muscles.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality strap. I’m using it as a posture strap and it’s excellent. I am buying two more for friends.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminTaker

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I thought 8 feet would be enough, but it's too short for the specific trussing for which I need it. Probably my fault for not researching it further before ordering (at least I knew not to get the 6-foot strap).
customer_reviews.author: scmdret

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The straps are great quality, but I ordered 4 10' ones and received 3 10' and 1 8'. Aside from that I'd recommend this product :)
customer_reviews.author: KEPCRN

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This yoga strap seems to be very well made. Looking forward to using it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Yoga Practice
customer_reviews.text: This strap is great for my yoga practice. I am not super flexible, so it helps me with actually doing some of the poses instead of doing something different or staying in the last pose. I know this will help my flexibility and benefit my practice.
customer_reviews.author: Sheli D.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for some stretches where I put the strap around ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for some stretches where I put the strap around my body. I have a few different straps but this one can do everything I need. It has replaced my shorter straps. Comfortable cotton and easy to use rings. It was a little stiff at first but didn't take long for the cotton to "break in" and become more pliable. And many color choices, too. I liked it so much I just ordered another to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: pghreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome yoga strap
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sturdy, great quality, love having my own strap since then it only has my germs on it. Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Thadia Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality yoga strap & clasp
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase for your yoga straps. I’m so very happy with the quality of the material and the strength of the clasp. I’ve purchased others only to be inconvenienc by poor quality. It was a waste of my time, not to mention my $. Thank you for your attention to detail! I’ll be coming to you when I need more straps.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Clever Yoga Yoga Strap for Stretching – Yoga Straps in Standard 8 Foot or Extra Long 10 Foot Length - Yoga Stretching Strap Thick Durable Cotton with Adjustable D-Ring - from
feature_bullets: STURDY NON-SLIP FLEXIBILITY STRAP ESSENTIAL ACCESSORY FOR ANY PRACTICE: The Yoga Strap is made from thick and durable cotton that won't slip so you can try new yoga poses with confidence. The exercise stretching strap is perfect for beginners to connect in basic poses. Intermediate and advanced yogis can use this strap to work towards advanced poses and holds

WANT TO INCREASE YOUR FLEXIBILITY ALIGNMENT AND POSTURE: Our fitness strap helps bridge the gap for those that don't yet have the flexibility. Use the strap to connect in simple stretches and over time your body will become more flexible and supple. It can also be used as a Physical Therapy Strap for PT sessions to allow increase movement with support

ORDER TODAY, RISK FREE: We love our customers! Our mission is to bring you the best yoga products on the market so you can get the most out of your personal yoga journey. That’s why we offer our special "Namaste" warranty. In the unlikely event you’re not 100% happy with your purchase, we’ll send you a free replacement or give you a full refund, no questions asked!

100% NON-TOXIC AND SAFE TO USE: We believe in creating premium quality eco friendly products that are safe for your body, mind and spirit. The 100% cotton strap is also machine washable for easy cleaning even after the sweatiest of practices. To ensure our strap lasts it is made of thick cotton that will soften over time with washing and regular use. It is available in a range of popular colors including purple, gray and black

DIFFERENT LENGTHS TO SUIT ANY YOGI: Our 8 ft yoga strap is the perfect length for basic poses. Our 10 ft yoga strap is great for the taller yogis, less flexible yogis or people looking for some more advanced wrapping or poses. The d ring strap is a great accessories for pilates and other exercises and can be used as a stretch bands
